function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity trade involving retail sale of products within a contained area could facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to the close proximity of customers and employees.","Impact":"Unmitigated proximity trade could lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the local community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitization protocols, enforce physical distancing measures, and promote the use of face coverings within the proximity trade establishments.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air purification systems, and crowd monitoring technologies can help mitigate the risk of contagious disease transmission within proximity trade establishments.","People":"Customers, employees, and local residents within the community are at risk.","Owner":"Local businesses, government authorities, and public health organizations can implement the mitigation measures."}]}
